active-effect-manager-lib.setting.enable: Feature: Enable the extended status effect name hud interaction
This will extend the functionality of the standard status effect name
active-effect-manager-lib.setting.showOn: Show only temporary effect on the status effects panel
If this module setting is enabled, it will show only temporary effect on the status effects panel, if disabled you will see all the active effect temporary and passive.
active-effect-manager-lib.setting.status: This is how status effects are sorted in the token HUD. Requires a Foundry reload on change.
active-effect-manager-lib.setting.enable: Hide active effect icons from unknown sources

With it enabled, creating duplicate effects between different items (e.g. "Poisoned" for various weapons or spells which inflict that condition) is as simple as dragging and dropping from one to the next. It also allows the application of item effects onto actors from the item sheet directly.

With it enabled, creating duplicate effects between different actors (e.g. "Poisoned" for various weapons or spells which inflict that condition) is as simple as dragging and dropping from one to the next.
Quickly select effects for a token or tokens by replacing the built-in status effect selector with an auto-complete-esque search box and filtered list.
active-effect-manager-lib.setting.permLe: Minimum permission level required to see an active effect
This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
Prints debug messages to the console
